Headline: No trains between 95th and 63rd
ShortDescription: Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between 95th and  63rd due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between 95th and  63rd due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

As a result, trains are operating only between Howard and 63rd at this time.

Shuttle buses are available from 95th to 63rd  to provide connecting service through the affected area. 

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
